alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 3:50PM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to Midnight MDT Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...During periods of snow, blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris, tree limbs, and downed power lines. Use caution if you must drive. Secure loose objects on your property to avoid damage. Ranchers should take precautions to protect young livestock. Don`t cause a spark!

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone
